titleStmt.title: The vviddovves teares a comedie. As it was often presented in the blacke and white Friers. Written by Geor. Chap.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet-street in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
